description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物、外交官，曾任中华人民共和国外交部发言人、中国驻芝加哥总领事，现任外交部部长助理兼外交部礼宾司司长。
description.en: Chinese politician and diplomat, former spokesperson for the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the People's Republic of China, former Consul General in Chicago, and currently serves as Assistant Minister of Foreign Affairs and Director-General of the Protocol Department of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国外交部礼宾司

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国外交部礼宾司

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国外交部内设机构，负责国家对外礼仪和典礼事务。
description.en: A department within the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the People's Republic of China responsible for state protocol and ceremonial affairs.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国驻芝加哥总领事

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国驻芝加哥总领事

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国派驻美国芝加哥的最高级别外交代表的职务。
description.en: The position of the highest-ranking diplomatic representative of the People's Republic of China in Chicago, United States.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国外交部发言人

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国外交部发言人

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国外交部的官方发言人职位。
description.en: The official spokesperson position of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物、外交官。
description.en: Chinese politician and diplomat.

description.zh-cn: 中国外交官。
description.en: Chinese diplomat.

description.zh-cn: 中国外交官。
description.en: Chinese diplomat.

description.zh-cn: 中国外交官。
description.en: Chinese diplomat.

description.zh-cn: 中国浙江省杭州市下辖的市辖区。
description.en: A district under the jurisdiction of Hangzhou City, Zhejiang Province, China.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国北京市的大学，以外语和国际学生教育为特色。
description.en: A university in Beijing, China, specializing in foreign languages and education for international students.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国外交部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国外交部
en: Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政府负责外交事务的组成部门。
description.en: The component department of the government of the People's Republic of China responsible for foreign affairs.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国外交部新闻司

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国外交部新闻司

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国外交部内设机构，负责新闻发布和公共外交。
description.en: A department within the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the People's Republic of China responsible for press releases and public diplomacy.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国在荷兰王国设立的外交代表机构。
description.en: The diplomatic mission of the People's Republic of China in the Kingdom of the Netherlands.

nodes.id: 中国驻旧金山总领事馆

zh-cn: 中国驻旧金山总领事馆

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国在美国加利福尼亚州旧金山设立的总领事馆。
description.en: The Consulate-General of the People's Republic of China in San Francisco, California, United States.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国外交部的高级官员职位。
description.en: A high-ranking official position in the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the People's Republic of China.

relationships.target: 富阳区

description.zh-cn: 洪磊出生于浙江省杭州市富阳区。
description.en: Hong Lei was born in Fuyang District, Hangzhou City, Zhejiang Province.

relationships.target: 北京语言大学

description.zh-cn: 1991年毕业于北京语言大学。
description.en: Graduated from Beijing Language and Culture University in 1991.

relationships.target: 中国共产党

description.zh-cn: 洪磊是中国共产党党员。
description.en: Hong Lei is a member of the Communist Party of China.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国外交部新闻司

description.zh-cn: 1991年至1992年，任外交部新闻司科员、随员。
description.en: From 1991 to 1992, served as a Staff Member and Attaché in the Information Department of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs.

relationships.target: 中国驻荷兰大使馆

description.zh-cn: 1992年至1996年，任驻荷兰大使馆随员、三秘。
description.en: From 1992 to 1996, served as an Attaché and Third Secretary at the Embassy in the Netherlands.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国外交部新闻司

description.zh-cn: 1996年至2000年，任外交部新闻司三秘、副处长。
description.en: From 1996 to 2000, served as a Third Secretary and Deputy Division Director in the Information Department of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs.

relationships.target: 中国驻旧金山总领事馆

description.zh-cn: 2000年至2004年，任驻旧金山总领事馆二秘、一秘。
description.en: From 2000 to 2004, served as a Second Secretary and First Secretary at the Consulate-General in San Francisco.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国外交部新闻司

description.zh-cn: 2004年至2016年7月，历任外交部新闻司处长、参赞、副司长。
description.en: From 2004 to July 2016, successively served as Division Director, Counselor, and Deputy Director-General of the Information Department of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国外交部发言人

description.zh-cn: 2010年11月至2016年7月21日，担任外交部发言人。
description.en: From November 2010 to July 21, 2016, served as a spokesperson for the Ministry of Foreign Affairs.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国驻芝加哥总领事

description.zh-cn: 2016年7月22日至2018年8月28日，担任中华人民共和国驻芝加哥总领事。
description.en: From July 22, 2016, to August 28, 2018, served as the Consul General of the People's Republic of China in Chicago.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国外交部礼宾司

description.zh-cn: 2018年9月至2019年2月，调任外交部礼宾司副司长。
description.en: From September 2018 to February 2019, transferred to the position of Deputy Director-General of the Protocol Department of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国外交部礼宾司

description.zh-cn: 2019年2月起，升任外交部礼宾司司长。
description.en: Since February 2019, promoted to Director-General of the Protocol Department of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs.

relationships.target: 外交部部长助理

description.zh-cn: 2024年10月起，升任外交部部长助理。
description.en: Since October 2024, promoted to Assistant Minister of Foreign Affairs.

relationships.target: 洪磊

description.zh-cn: 洪磊接替秦刚担任中华人民共和国外交部礼宾司司长职务。
description.en: Hong Lei succeeded Qin Gang as the Director-General of the Protocol Department of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the People's Republic of China.

relationships.target: 洪磊

description.zh-cn: 洪磊接替赵卫平担任中华人民共和国驻芝加哥总领事职务。
description.en: Hong Lei succeeded Zhao Weiping as the Consul General of the People's Republic of China in Chicago.

relationships.target: 赵建

description.zh-cn: 赵建接替洪磊担任中华人民共和国驻芝加哥总领事职务。
description.en: Zhao Jian succeeded Hong Lei as the Consul General of the People's Republic of China in Chicago.

relationships.target: 洪磊

description.zh-cn: 洪磊接替秦刚成为中华人民共和国外交部发言人。
description.en: Hong Lei succeeded Qin Gang to become a spokesperson for the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the People's Republic of China.

relationships.target: 耿爽

description.zh-cn: 耿爽接替洪磊担任中华人民共和国外交部发言人职务。
description.en: Geng Shuang succeeded Hong Lei as the spokesperson for the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the People's Republic of China.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国外交部礼宾司
relationships.target: 中华人民共和国外交部

description.zh-cn: 礼宾司是中华人民共和国外交部的内设机构。
description.en: The Protocol Department is an internal department of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the People's Republic of China.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国外交部新闻司
relationships.target: 中华人民共和国外交部

description.zh-cn: 新闻司是中华人民共和国外交部的内设机构。
description.en: The Information Department is an internal department of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the People's Republic of China.
